title: Need Help?
info: Here are some frequently asked questions

questions.question: What is our streamlined property inspection and inventory platform?
questions.answer: Our platform allows you to create detailed inspection reports, including property condition, photos, and issues, directly from your mobile or tablet using our inspection app.

questions.question: What types of inspections can I perform with your app?
questions.answer: You can perform professional inventories, check-ins, check-outs, interim inspections, building inspections, risk assessments, and much more.

questions.question: How are your services billed?
questions.answer: We offer several pricing plans tailored to the needs of individuals and professionals, including monthly and annual subscription options. You can check our pricing page for more details.

questions.question: Are your inspection reports compliant with industry standards?
questions.answer: Yes, our reports are designed to comply with industry standards and regulations, ensuring accurate and reliable records.

questions.question: What are the benefits of using your platform for real estate professionals?
questions.answer: Our platform simplifies the creation of inspection reports, improves record accuracy, and allows you to manage inspections efficiently and professionally, saving you time and improving client satisfaction.

questions.question: Is your platform secure?
questions.answer: Yes, the security of your data is our priority. We use advanced security protocols, including data encryption, to protect your information and ensure its confidentiality.
